title: Managing Startup Programs
description: Step-by-step guide on managing which apps launch at startup.
solution: Use Task Manager > Startup tab to disable unnecessary programs.

title: Installing Browser Extensions
description: Instructions for safely installing browser extensions. It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English. Many desktop publishing packages and web page editors now use Lorem Ipsum as their default model text, and a search for 'lorem ipsum' will uncover many web sites still in their infancy. Various versions have evolved over the years, sometimes by accident, sometimes on purpose (injected humour and the like).
solution: Visit Chrome Web Store, search for the extension, and click 'Add to Chrome'.

title: Optimizing Device Performance
solution: Remove unused apps, manage storage, and restart regularly.
